card.name: A Blazing Fire and a Mug of Beer
card.graphics: A Blazing Fire and a Mug of Beer.jpg
card.text: Unique. Playable on Barliman Butterbur during the site phase at Bree. t+1 to his body. Tap Barliman Butterburduring your organization phase to bring a Marvels Told, Glamour of Surpassing Excellence or Memories Recalled from your sideboard or discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle). Discard this card if Barliman Butterbur is not at Bree or Bree becomes a Haven [H].

card.name: A Thing of Surpassing Potency
card.text: Playable if The One Ring is in play and borne by a non-Hobbit character with a mind greater than 4. All bonusses from other special items and rings in play are modified by -1 (to a minimum of 1). Additionally, all CC by other ringbearers are modified by -1, and any manifestation of Narya, Nenya or Vilya cannot be used.

card.name: A Weapon in the Right Hands
card.graphics: A Weapon in the Right Hands.jpg
card.text: Unique. Playable on The One Ring. You may take this card from your play deck (shuffle) when The One Ring comes into play. Bearer may make a CC to cancel the effects of Rolled Down to the SeaC. Additionally the company has its hazard limit increased by +1 to a minimum of 3. Discard if The One Ring leaves active play.

attr.value: Information, Items (minor*) *—Secret Book, Records Unread or Thror's Map only-
(1st) Hobbits — 3 strikes with 5 prowess; (2nd) Dúnedain — 2 strikes with 10 prowess.
all Information resources in play by hero players are worth 1 less mp.
Tap a Hobbit to take Mathom Lore from your discard pile into hand; Mathom Lore may be played here as if at Bag End.
Opponent may play as automatic-attack 1 non-unique hazard creature with an asterix (*) from his hand, normally keyed to Border-hold [B] or Rohan.
When leaving this site a company may move as if Dagorlad and Rohan where adjacent.
Opponent may play as automatic-attack 1 non-unique hazard creature normally keyed to Shadow-hold [S].
When leaving this site a company may move as if Dagorlad and Rohan were adjacent.

card.name: Asfaloth
card.text: Unique. Horse. Playable at any non-Haven [H] site in Rhudaur or Cardolan. Characters with home site Rivendell may play Asfaloth at a tapped site. tap: cancel a Nazgûl attack, or a strike from a non-automatic attack. If controller of Asfaloth is the only character in the company, he may move 3 additional non-Coastal Sea [c] regions when moving to a site where another company is present and tap: give +1 to all of his corruption checks this turn.

card.name: Backpack
card.text: taTap bearer and discard Backpack to replace it withany non-unique, non-hoard minor item from your discard pile or sideboard. If bearer is Sam Gamgee, you may take 2 minor items (no Backpack) instead. Cannot be duplicated on a given bearer.

card.name: Beer from the East-farthing
card.text: Food item. Playable only from sideboard on a Hobbit at a site in The Shire, if his company is forced to do nothing duringthe site phase (this card overrides that effect); or at any site instead if you discard a Backpack from the Hobbit. Hobbit need not tap to play this item and it does not tap the site. Discard this item to allow the company to undertake an action (e.g. make an influence attempt) and play non-mp resource cards during the site phase.

card.name: Black Riders
card.text: Playable if Doors of Night is in play. Nazgûl creatures may be played against hero companies keyed to Border-land [b], Wilderness [w], and Shadow-land [s], and to non-Haven [H] sites in these regions. Any Nazgûl attacking in this way is detainment, unless a character in the defending company bears a ring special item. Discard when Doors of Night leaves play. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Bob
card.text: Unique. Hobbit. Playable at Bree. Also playable at any site in Arthedain or The Shire if you discard (for no effect) Memories Recalled. A company with Barliman Butterbur may play Bob at a tapped site. tap: fullfill the requirement of discarding Lost Knowledge for a card played with/on his company.

attr.value: (1st) Hobbits — 3 strikes with 6 prowess (2nd) Dúnedain — 3 strikes with 10 prowess
Port on Baranduin. *You may play an additional gold ring item the same turn To Satisfy the Questioner is played at this site.
Hobbits — 3 strikes with 6 prowess (detainment against hero companies); tMerry may tap to cancel this attack.

Port on Baranduin. Hobbits faction and any Hobbit character is playable at this site. Undead creatures keyable to Wilderness [w] may be played at this site; any Hobbit receives +4 prowess against a strike from such an attack.

card.name: Broken Heirlooms
card.text: All resource effects that would modify the mp valueof an item, ally or faction to be worth more than their normal mp value (as listed on their card) are canceled. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Capricious Spirit
card.text: Playable on a maia or spawn ally. The controlling character must make an influence check against the ally. Make a roll and add the controlling character’s unused EI; if the result is lower than the ally’s mind +6, discard the ally.

card.name: Council of Elrond
card.text: Unique. Playable if you have Elrond and any manifestation of a wizard in play at Rivendell. Characters cannot leave Rivendell while this card is in play. Any diplomat or sage at Rivendell can tap to discard one non- unique, non-corruption, non-environment hazard in play on any company; afterwards the character makes a CC.

card.name: Courtesy Lessened of Late
card.text: Playable only on-guard. Reveal this card to target and cancel any card or effect that would allow opponent to bring in a character with the company during the site phase.

card.name: Deeds of Lonely Daring
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on 1 of your grey agent characters in play: turn him face down, he now is an agent. Discard any allies he controls and place him at another site in the same or an adjacent region as his current site (resulting in legal movement, otherwise this card cannot be played).

card.name: Do Not Use It Again
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on an item borne by a character in a company of 3 or more characters at a Haven [H]. Item is “concealed.” While concealed, item is worth half its mp value (round down), gives 0 CP, and cannot be used. Concealed items cannot not be discarded or affected by hazards or resources. Discard this card if company size is below 3, during any next organization phase if you so choose, or if bearer becomes wounded in CvCC.

card.name: Eagle-watch
card.text: Unique. Playable at Isildur’s Tomb or Daeron’s Pool if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: if an Eagle ally, Gandalf or Radagast is in the company (+3) (apply only once). May not be played by an overt company. If you are a Wizard or Elf-lord, you may play Spying out the Land as if a spell.

card.name: Estel
card.text: Unique. Playable on Strider at a Haven [H]. +1 to his CC.tap: cancel an effect in the same chain-of- effects that required an agent at his site to tap during his site phase.

card.name: Fate let our Ways meet
card.text: This card is played in lieu of a minor item with a starting company at a Haven [H]. The company may play an ally with mind 2 or less with the company; place this card with the ally, which is never worth any mp. Discard this card if associated ally leaves play. Alternatively if starting at a non-Haven [H] you may play with any 1 character with the company (or 2 Hobbits), which does not have the same race or homesite as any of the other starting characters; otherwise discard this card.

card.name: Fatty Bolger
card.text: Unique. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at his home site. All his CC are modified by +1. tap: cancel a strike against another hobbit in his company.

card.name: Fatty Lumpkin
card.text: Unique. Horse. Only playable at Tom’s House on the controller of Tom Bombadil or Goldberry (even if the site is tapped). tap: cancel any hazard effect that would discard an ally, or to return an ally that has been discarded this turn to your hand from discard pile.

card.name: Flight Unmarked
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a company, if you tap a ranger. You may (attempt to) move this turn to an Under-deeps site with a surface site in the same or adjacent region as your current site (or vice versa). You are considered to use both region and Under-deeps movement. Alternatively, you may move to a Hidden Site (without further requirements).

card.name: Focussed Staff
card.text: Ritual. Playable on a Wizard’s Staff during the site phase at a site where Information is playable. taTap the Wizard and the site. +1 to all CC required by rituals and light enchantments. tap: give +1 to all rolls required for bearer’s company to move to adjacent Under-deeps sites. tap: give -2 prowess to an Undead attack against bearer’s company. Bearer makes a CC when this card becomes tapped. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Foe Beyond Any of You
card.text: Playable on an attack by a unique hazard creature with a prowess of 13 or more. All strikes must be assigned to the highest prowess character in the company (including all modifications; defender’s choice if equal), regardless of his status or any card effect. Each excess strike gives a -1 modification to his prowess; Pierced by Many Wounds cannot be played on the attack.

card.name: Golden Chain
card.text: Playable at any Haven [H] on the bearer of The One Ring, regardless of his status. Place this card with The One Ring anddiscard it when that item leaves play for any reason. The One Ring gives 1 less mp and 1 less CP. Bearer may opt to use its bonus to prowess, body and EI, but must make a CC if using it (e.g. before facing a strike for prowess/body, before making an influence attempt, and/or during organization phase for controlling a characterI). This item gives no CP.

card.name: Green Leaves and Lilies White
card.text: Unique. Playable on Tom Bombadil. If in the company of Goldberry, Tom Bombadil is not discarded as per his card text. Discard this card if he is not in the company of Goldberry or your Wizard or Elf-lord.

card.name: Grey Pilgrim
card.text: Playable on Gandalf during your organization phase. If his company contains no other characters or allies, he may move up to 5 regions, his hazard limit is reduced by 1, and River or Enchanted Stream cannot be played against him.

card.name: Grip! Fang! Wolf!
card.text: Playable on a Noble Hound, when his company is facing a creature attack. Make a roll and add Noble Hound’s prowess; if the result is greater than the prowess of the hazard creature that your company is facing, put it in your mp (all of its attacks are defeated). Otherwise, remove Noble Hound from the game.

card.name: Hands of the Weak
card.text: All hero characters with mind less than 6 and normal prowess less than 4 gain +1 prowess and +1 EI Each avatar and hero character with mind greater than 7 must make a roll at the end of their organization phase. If the result is less than 5, that character is tapped. Discard when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Helm Clove Asunder
card.text: Playable after a successful strike by 1 of your characters in CvCC. Make a roll for a battle-gear item borne by the wounded character, modified by +1 if your character bears a weapon (+2 if the weapon is unique). If the result is greater than 9, discard opponent’s item. May be played during your opponent’s turn.

card.name: His Own Master
card.text: No ally may be played at a tapped site. Unless Doors of Night is in play, no ally may be played at a Haven [H]. Discard if any play deck is exhausted.

card.name: I Pass the Test
card.text: Playable on The One Ring, if the bearer is at a Haven [H]. Rotate this card 90° each time a Wizard or a character with a mind greater than 6 at the same site as the bearer of The One Ring (other than the bearer) passes a CC. This may only be done once per turn, and once per game for each given character. This card gives 1 mp for each time rotated (to a maximum of 4). Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: It Is My Own
card.text: No item can be stored. Any character attempting to store a non-item card must make the required CC at -2.

card.name: Keeping of Good Faith
card.text: Playable on a hazard creature with an asterix (*) with 1 strike for each of its attacks, attacking a hero company. All attacks are canceled and the creature becomes an ally under the control of any character in the company that now taps (otherwise discard this card). It has a mind of 1, prowess equal to its normal prowess minus 7 (to a minimum of 0), and a body as listed on its card (8 if none is listed). The ally is worth ally mp equal to the mp value as listed on its card.Alternatively, may be played on a detainment attack against a hero company: the attack is canceled.

card.name: Kheled-zâram
card.text: Playable on a character at Dimrill Dale, if Doors of Night is not in play. When you play this card, heal and/or untap the character, or untap the site: you may take an Information resource from your discard pile to hand. Character makes a CC at -2 (-3 if a Dwarf). All automatic-attacks at Dimrill Dale receive +1 to prowess and strikes. Next time character would untap, discard this card instead. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Labyrintine Libraries
card.text: Any company that wants to play a Lost Knowledge card or fullfil the requirement of Lost Knowledge being discarded must tap a sage in addition to any other requirements. Discard this card when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Light and Flame
card.text: Spell. -2 prowess to all Ringwraith and Dragon-characters at the site for the rest of the turn. May also be played inresponse to a card played by a Ringwraith or Dragon-character at your site during the site phase: his company must immediately engage in CvCC with your company. Additionally, any Ringwraith must also be taken to hand on a body check result of 6 or 9 (unless killed by the roll). Wizard makes a CC at -3.

card.name: Local Hospitality
card.text: Playable on a covert company containing a character whose home site is the same as the company’s current site. Heal (from wounded to untapped) or untap a character in the company whose home site is not the company’s current site.

card.name: Long wailing Cry
card.text: Playable on a hero company that has just faced a Nazgûl attack. Each character in the company whose mind value is lower than the number of Nazgûl permanent events in play, is tapped.

card.name: Lore of the Rings
card.text: Lore. Place this card on your sage avatar when in play. He may tap to test a gold ring in his company; afterwards he makes a CC. Discard a Lost Knowledge card from the company to place Wisdom to Wield with this card from hand or discard pile: it affects your avatar and is not discarded (unless this card is discarded).

card.name: Many Burdens
card.text: Unique. Playable on an avatar, if your opponent has more than 6 characters or more than 2 companies in play. Tap the avatar if untapped. Next time he would untap, remove this card from the game instead.

card.name: Many Leagues
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on your Elf-lordor Wizard (except Saruman), if at a non-Under-deeps Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D], or at Isengard. You may reveal as site card any Haven [H] or Free- hold [F], if his company size is equal to or smaller than the number of following cards in the company (allies without flying ability count as characters): Gwaihir, Meneldor, Winged Change Master, The Windlord Found Me. You are considered moving only through the region of the starting site. Wizard or Elf-lord makes a CC at -2.

card.name: Memories of Ages Past
card.text: Playable on Gollum or Stinker. He is considered a Hobbitfor all purposes. +2 to your riddling rolls. Make a CC at -2 during your untap phase. Tap Gollum or Stinker to take a gold ring item playable at his site, or a manifestation of an item controlled by an opponent at his site, from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Meneldor
card.text: Unique. Eagle. Winged. Wizard or Elf-lord only (except Saruman). Playable at Eagle’s Eyrie, or at the (tapped) site where you have played The Windlord Found Me this turn. Not playable by an overt company. The Windlord Found Me may be stored at any Free-hold [F]: you may play any character from your discard pile or play deck (as if Wizard at a Haven [H]). Discard Meneldor when moving to an Under-deeps site or a Dungeon.

attr.value: if successfull, place this site with Hobbitsinstead of discarding it (or returning it to the site deck), it is worth 2 mp.
(1st) Hobbits — 7 strikes with 4 prowess; (2nd) Elves — 3 strikes with 9 prowess.
all resources and characters only playable or storable at sites in The Shire are worth 1 less mp (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: Mr. Underhill
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Frodo. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at one of his home sites. You may replace Mr. Underhill at any time with Frodo from play deck, discard pile, or sideboard; all non follower cards controlled by Mr. Underhill are transferred to Frodo. tap: during end-of-turn phase to take Halfling Stealth from discard pile to hand. Discard if he moves to a site not in The Shire or its adjacent regions. .

attr.value: Bree, any site in The Shire

card.name: Much-trodden Paths
card.text: Unique. When the new or current site of a company would be tapped by a hazard played by another player, a ranger in that company may tap to untap that site again (discard this card afterwards). When a company would be sent back to its site of origin by a hazard played by another player, a ranger in that company may tap to negate all effects of that hazard (discard this card afterwards).

card.name: New Best Friend
card.text: Playable on a Haven [H] or Free-hold [F]. Characters at this site may transfer the control of allies under their control to other characters, of either the same or higher mind, or to an avatar, in their company. Afterwards tap the ally if untapped. Discard this card when site is discarded or returned to the location deck. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: No Memory of This Place
card.text: Cancels the effect of Secret Entrance and Forewarned is Forearmed. Additionally, each company at an Under-deeps site intending to move must make an Under-deeps movement roll for each adjacent site during the organization phase. This is done before a new site is selected and instead of during movement/hazard phase. Such roll is modified by -3, but if successful the site may be taken from location deck or discard pile.

card.name: No Place for a Pony
card.text: Playable on a horse ally. Discard the ally if its company enters a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] this turn, or moves to an Under-deeps site or Dungeon. This card cannot be played on guard.

card.name: Nob
card.text: Unique. He may not be among the starting characters and he may only be brought into play at his home site. May be controlled by Barliman Butterbur or a Hobbit costing no direct influence.tap: tap a face-up agent at his current or new site.

card.name: Rangers at Sarn Ford
card.text: Dúnedain. 5 strikes. Only playable against minion companies. May be played keyed to Arthedain, Cardolan or The Shire. +2 prowess against Ringwraiths.

card.name: Reunion
card.text: Playable on a Haven [H] or Free-hold [F]. All characters at the site receive +2 to their CC when transferring non-ring items between characters of the same race or characters with the same home site. Additionally, all characters at the site may transfer items during their end-of-turn phase. Discard this card if the site leaves active play or if a CC forced by transferring items at this site fails.

card.name: Ruddy Varmint
card.text: Unique. Animal. Playable at any tapped or untapped Ruins & Lairs [R] in The Shire or its adjacent regions. +1 to trickery, burglary, flattery or riddling attempts made by a character in his company. tap: cancel a strike against himself from a non- automatic-attack.

attr.value: Hobbits faction and any ally playable at Bag End are playable at this site. Place this card in your mp pile instead of discarding it: all your rolls for Early Harvest are modified by +2.
(1st) Hobbits — 5 strikes with 5 prowess; (2nd) Dúnedain — 3 strikes with 10 prowess.
play a food minor item from sideboard with a company at Isengard or a site in The Shire.

card.name: Say Friend and Enter
card.text: Ritual. Playable on a sage during the site phase, before facing any automatic-attacks. Tap the sage. Any ongoing hazard effect that causes the company to do nothing during the site phase is now canceled.

card.name: Second Breakfast
card.text: Tap all Hobbits in the company. At the end of the movement/hazard phase, if there are any Hobbits in the company, you may take another movement/hazard phase but you may only move up to 3 regions. Alternatively, playable as a hazard short-event: tap a Hobbit.

card.name: Seized upon the Bearer
card.text: Attacking hazard creatures may assign a strike to any hero bearer of a ring before other strikes are assigned (as normal). If such a strike is assigned to the bearer of The One Ring, the strike receives +2 prowess.

card.name: Shire-ale
card.text: Playable at any tapped or untapped Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F] in the Shire, or at Bree. Any Hobbit bearer may discard this item to receive +3 prowess and -2 body till the end of the turn; target Hobbit cannot use Halfling Stealth, Sneakin or Stealth (all Sneakin or Stealth in play on the company are canceled when Shire-ale is used). Any bearer may discard this item to discard either Despair of the Heart or Alone and Unadvised on any character in his company; target character makes a body check modified by -1. Failing the body check wounds, but does not eliminate the character.

card.name: Some Devilry at Work
card.text: Playable on a face-up grey agent. The agent must return to any one of his home sites (controlling player’s choice; turn the agent face down if none of his home sites are available, he is considered at his home site).

card.name: Speak, Friend, and Enter!
card.text: Playable on a Shadow-hold [S], Dark-hold [D] or Hidden Site, against a moving hero company. Cannot be played on-guard. Unless the company contains a sage or Hobbit, or you discard a Knowledge or Information card from hand or the company, the company must do nothing during the site phase. Additionally, cancels the effects of Secret Entrance.

card.name: Taint of the Wilds
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a non-Wizard ranger. Target character receives 1 CP and makes a CC when a resource card requiring ranger skill is played on any member of his company. During the organization phase at a haven [H] or a site that acts as a Haven for healing purposes, the character may tap to attempt to remove this card and make a roll: if the result is greater than 7, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Taurnil
card.text: Unique. Nando. -2 prowess against Animals and Awakened Plants, +2 prowess against Orcs.

card.name: Ted Sandyman
card.text: Unique. Agent. He may not be among the starting characters, unless you start the game at Bag End. May only be brought into play at his home site (regardless of any other card effects). Unless you are a Dwarf-lord or Gandalf, Mischief in a Mean Way is playable at his current site in The Shire. Agent only: +2 EI against Hobbits.

card.name: The Bullroarer's Club
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at Michel Delving. Also playable at any site in The Shire on The Thain or a character with Mathom Lore. Hobbit Warrior only: +2 prowess and +2 EI against Hobbits.

card.name: The Great Willow
card.text: Unique. Playble at The Willow Dingle. +2 prowess against Hobbits. tap: cancel an Awakened Plant hazard creature attack against any 1 of your companies in Eriador. Discard if its company moves outside of Old Forest*.

attr.value: Rangers of the North faction is playable at this site.
Opponent may play as an automatic-attack Ride against the Enemy from his hand or discard pile, and the needed character may also come from his discard pile.
The first Information card played here does not tap the site.

card.name: The Prancing Pony
card.text: Unique. Playable on Bree. Tap a non-overt character during the site phase to make Information or News from the Shire playable at Bree this turn. Any player may tap an agent at Bree and discard this card to make Nazgûl creatures playable at the site (not counting against the hazard limit if a ringbearer is present).Discard this card if Bree leaves active play.

card.name: The Ring's Dominion
card.text: Playable on your Fallen-wizard or Elf-lord, if Spells Born of Discord is in play. Instead of tapping to use a magic ring he bears, he may make a CC and tap the magic ring.

attr.value: Contains a hoard. If Here, There or Yonder is played at this site to bring Tom Bombadil into play, it is automatically successfull.
Contains a hoard. Unless the automatic-attack was canceled this turn,Blackbole may be played at this site, even if tapped.

card.name: There Is Always Vengeance
card.text: Unique. Playable on Aragorn II or Strider, if you are a Wizard but your Wizard is not in play. He receives +1 to mind, EI, prowess, and body. He may tap during your organization phase to shuffle up to 2 cards from your sideboard into your play deck. Aragorn II gives -5 mp if eliminated. Discard this card if your Wizard enters play. You may take this card into hand from your sideboard or discard pile when you play Sacrifice of Form.

card.name: There's Queer Folk About
card.text: Opponent must reveal to you any agent cards he hasin his hand. If none are available he must reveal his whole hand. If you are Fallen-Saruman, you may also play this card as a hazard.

card.name: Thrice Told Tales
card.text: Playable on a sage. Bearer is not considered a sage. Discard this card if his company ever moves at least 2 regions in its site path.

card.name: Travelled to the Corners of the World
card.graphics: Travelled to the Corners of the World.jpg
card.text: Playable if you have in play: at least 1 faction playable at a site in the Northern Waste or Eriador; at least 1 faction playable at a site in Wilderland; at least 1 faction playable at a site in the Sun-lands; and if there is a site in a Coastal Sea [c] region in your discard pile. Place this card in your mp pile. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Troll-shaws
card.text: Playable on a character at Ettenmoors. If a Hobbit, he gains the sage skill and this card may be stored at Bag End for 1 mp. If a ranger, he may tap to bring Many Turns and Doublings from your discard pile to your play deck. If a sage, he may tap to take Dawn Take You All from discard pile to hand. If a scout, he may tap to make major items playable at Ettenmoors this turn (even hoard items). Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: True Hearted Man
card.text: Unique. Playable on Boromir, if his company faces a creature attack with multiple strikes. He receives +1 prowess against the attack and must face a separate strike sequence for each strike of the attack. If he is unwounded after the attack, place this card with him. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take Many Foes He Fought from your discard pile to your hand.

attr.value: (1st) Hobbits — 6 strikes with 6 prowess;(2nd) Dúnedain — 3 strikes with 10 prowess.
all automatic-attacks at sites in The Shire receive -1 prowess and strikes.
Hobbits — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment). Pippin may tap to cancel this automatic-attack.
taTap a Hobbit during site phase to make major items playable at this site this turn.

card.name: Until All Else Is Conquered
card.text: Playable on a Haven [H], if the bearer of The One Ring is there. Any non-minion company at the site faces 3 attacks (cannot be canceled by any effect) at the beginning of the site phase: Orcs — 5 strikes with 8 prowess; Trolls— 3 strikes 10 prowess; Nazgûl — 2 strikes with 13 prowess. Discard The One Ring if any strike against its bearer is successful. If all attacks are defeated, place this card in opponents mp pile. The bearer of The One Ring cannot leave the site while this card is in play. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: We Must Join with Him
card.text: Only playable by a minion Dark-player (unless Saruman is your opponent) if you have a company bearing the Palantir of Orthanc at Isengard. Store the palantir. Isengard becomes 1 of your Darkhavens [K] and you can play any number of Uruk-hai characters there. Discard this card when Isengard is discarded or returned to its location deck. Alternatively, playable if you are Fallen-Saruman and have the Palantir of Orthanc in play at Isengard. You may bring any number of Uruk-hai characters into play at Isengard.
